Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.phpmaven.plugin.build.FileHelper

public final class FileHelper
extends Object

Static utilities for file handling.

Author:
Christian Wiedemann, Tobias Sarnowski

Method Detail

copyToFolder

public static void copyToFolder(File sourceDirectory,
                                File targetDirectory,
                                File sourceFile,
                                boolean forceOverwrite)
                         throws IOException
Copies over a file from the sourceDirectory to the targetDirectory preserving its relative subdirectories.

Parameters:
sourceDirectory - where the main source directory is
targetDirectory - where the target directory is
sourceFile - which file to copy to the target directory
forceOverwrite - if timestamps should be ignored
Throws:
IOException - if something goes wrong while copying

unzipElements

public static void unzipElements(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                 File targetDirectory,
                                 List<String> elements,
                                 IPhpExecution exec)
                          throws IOException
Unzips all files to the given directory (using jar).

Parameters:
log - Logging
targetDirectory - where to unpack the files to
elements - list of files to unpack
exec - execution helper used to unphar elements
Throws:
IOException - if something goes wrong while copying

readUrl

public static String readUrl(URL url)
                      throws IOException
Reads an url to string; should only be used for non-blocking connections (f.e. jar file contents and other things).

Parameters:
url - the url to be read
Returns:
the results
Throws:
